lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The 350 mln Ecu three-year package of social and structural measures agreed early today by European Community farm ministers features a plan to compensate farmers for reducing output of certain surplus products, EC Commission sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Andriessen did not give full details, but said member state aid would be subject to "strict criteria to avoid distortion of competition."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: At a news conference EC Farm Commissioner Frans Andriessen said the Commission is also working on proposals to enable the EC and member states to provide direct income supports for relatively poor farmers.
